entities.name: padfoot
entities.description: The final lesson of the afternoon is taught by Padfoot, also known as Sirius Black. ( 511 )

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is standing outside the classroom door with Crabbe and Goyle. (Malfoy, Crabbe, and Goyle were standing in a huddle outside the classroom door)

entities.name: pansy parkinson

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is approaching the classroom door with Ron and Hermione. (Pansy’s pug-like face peer ed excitedly around Goyle’s broad back as Harry, Ron, and Hermione approached)

entities.name: witch weekly
